record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - February 05, 2008)

[Page: S673]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order now before the Senate.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:23 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, February 6, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
